Â

POST â€“ Post ISD will be providing meals to our studentsÂ whoÂ live in Post.Â ParentsÂ need to fill out the online survey that is on the Post ISD webpage.Â You willÂ need to fill out the part about delivered meals and put yourÂ address in the spaceÂ provided.Â This will get youÂ added to the routes, which will start delivering on Monday.Â The Post ISDÂ website will have information about times for delivery.Â
If there are questions, they can call 806-495-3343 and ask for Superintendent Dickson.
SLATON â€“ Slaton ISD will be providing meals to our students who live in Slaton. Information can be found on the Slaton ISD website.
LUBBOCK â€“Â Students who reside in Lubbock can pick up meals through Lubbock ISD.
